definition: hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
left and right hands/(fig.) capable assistant/right-hand man

sentences.english: I lifted my right hand and made scissoring movements with my first two fingers.
sentences.chinese: 我擡起右手，用食指和中指做了幾個剪東西的動作。

sentences.english: For anybody who bounces, their tremolo will be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 如果誰的右手上下跳動，那麼他的輪指一定有問題。

sentences.english: The bamboo stick on her right hand thrusted toward yet another swordman 's eye.
sentences.chinese: 左手微舉，右手中的竹棒已向一名吳士眼中戳去。

sentences.english: My right hand has five fingers, too.
sentences.chinese: 我的右手也有五根手指。

sentences.english: He lacdfds. com on his back, his teeth set, his right hand clenched on his breast.
sentences.chinese: 他仰臥着，牙關緊閉，右手緊握着拳頭胸口上。

sentences.english: The boxer feinted with his right hand and struck with his left hand.
sentences.chinese: 這個拳擊手用右手佯攻而出左手擊打。

sentences.english: Some of monkeys were touching their left ear with their righthand .
sentences.chinese: 一些猴子正在用他們的右手觸摸他們的左耳。

sentences.english: I will meet you on the right hand side of the department store.
sentences.chinese: 我將在百貨公司的右手邊與你會面。

sentences.english: It should be further along your right.
sentences.chinese: 應該在你右手邊再往前一些。

sentences.english: Youth have been out of danger by the emergency, but his right hand was cut off tesujis, probably will be disabled.
sentences.chinese: 經急救少年已脫險，但右手手筋被砍斷，恐將殘廢。

sentences.english: He feinted with his left hand and hit me with his right.
sentences.chinese: 他用左手做了一個假動作，用右手打到了我。

sentences.english: Bring a pot of left, right hand pull out Wuxian.
sentences.chinese: 左手攜一壺，右手挈五絣。

sentences.english: But when thou doest alms, let not thy left hand know what thy right hand doeth
sentences.chinese: 你施捨的時候，不要叫左手知道右手所作的。

sentences.english: Yes, it's just over there on your right.
sentences.chinese: 是的，它就在那邊，你的右手邊。

sentences.english: All references to mouse clicks assume use of a right-handed mouse.
sentences.chinese: 所有鼠標點擊參考都假設是個右手鼠標。

sentences.english: And if your right hand causes you to sin, cut it off and throw it away.
sentences.chinese: 若是右手叫你跌倒，就砍下來丟掉。

definition: the five fingers of one's hand
